content.query:
CREATE TABLE SalesGold(CustomerID BIGINT, Product VARCHAR (500),
 Retailer VARCHAR (500), SalesMonth DATE,
 UnitsSold INT , Revenue FLOAT , SalesValueUSD FLOAT, TotalRevenue FLOAT)

 SELECT * FROM SalesGold




 EXEC sp_rename 'dbo.SalesGold.UnitSold', 'UnitsSold', 'COLUMN';


 GRANT INSERT, SELECT ON SalesGold TO Olamide
